text:
For over three decades,
CaseWare has shown
how having the right platform tools
and support backed by a strong partner

and proven innovator
makes all the difference.
We develop audit and assurance software,
and CaseWare is assisting

and transforming the
accounting profession.

So, the audit profession
is highly regulated
to ensure the integrity

and reliability of financial
reporting. Auditors must adhere
to strict standards and guidelines.

The ability to leverage AWS
as our AI partner ensures

that we continue to enforce
our strict requirements.

We leveraged Bedrock to build
an AI assistant chatbot
that can summarize documents,

answer interactive
domain specific questions,
and provide citations to those answers.

The ability to leverage
AWS services in conjunction

with Bedrock has allowed
us to be innovative,

to provide summaries to documents
that are both text-based
and scanned a non-English response
to our customers without having

to re-implement our
prompts in those languages.

The key success to this
product was the ability for us
to roll this out globally.
Having Bedrock be available

with different LLM offerings
globally is really the driving
force for us to be able to market this
and have customers globally leverage it.

The value add that we gain
by partnering with AWS
and Bedrock are the guarantees

and assurances that our
customer's data is secure,
the prompts they provide are never stored,

and all third party
certifications are maintained
and enforced.
